WHOAMI(1) User Commands WHOAMI(1)

NAME

whoami - display the effective current username

SYNOPSIS

whoami

DESCRIPTION

Whoami prints the user name associated with its effective user id. If invoked after su(1), the newly assumed name is printed, instead of the name previously used for logging in.

SEE ALSO

id(1), who(1)
10/26/03 Heirloom Toolchest
